channel.title: Report on pnijhara's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Report on pnijhara's blog

item.title: Semester 2 Report
item.description: Followed by semester 1 and the holidays in which I tried to learn web development using Django. My experience with Django was not that good. As a beginner, the first thing I did was surfing over the internet for the framework to start with web development. After lurking around for a while and taking a glimpse over the documentation of both the frameworks (Django & Flask), I found Flask to be very straightforward.

item.title: Semester 1 Report
item.description: Aligarh Muslim University, the university I chose to pursue my bachelor’s degree. It was not an easy decision, but somehow I managed to get in there. Electrical Engineering was never on my list, but when you are unable to get your dream branch you have to be satisfied with what your faith is. So, here I am studying Electrical Engineering at AMU. First month, away from home was like jumping straight into hell.
